overview: The Grand Duchess Marie Louise is the beautiful young ruler of Molvania. She is a fun-loving girl who secretly hopes that the revolutionaries who threaten to take over her country are able to do so, as that will free her to go to America to be with the soldier friends she met during the Great War.
tagline: Whirls of excitement, a riot of laughs, and the funniest girl on the screen.
title: Little Miss Rebellion
